src:
Man of the Match Bayern Munchen vs Olympiakos: Robert Lewandowski
07 Nov 2019, 03:56 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Robert Lewandowski terpilih menjadi pemain terbaik alias man of the match dalam laga matchday keempat fase grup Liga Champions 2019-20 antara Bayern Munchen vs Olympiakos, Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB.
Selain berperan mencetak gol pembuka Bayern, Lewandowski juga konsisten meneror pertahanan Olympiakos hampir sepanjang pertandingan.
Bayern akhirnya sukses memenangi laga ini dengan skor 2-0 setelah Ivan Perisic mencetak gol kedua pada menit-menit akhir. Bayern pun memastikan kelolosan ke babak 16 besar.
text:
Man of the Match Bayern Munich vs Olympiacos: Robert Lewandowski
Nov 7 2019, 03:56 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Robert Lewandowski was chosen as the best player alias man of the match in the fourth matchday match of the 2019-20 Champions League group phase between Bayern Munich vs Olympiakos, Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs.
In addition to playing Bayern's opening goal, Lewandowski also consistently terrorized the Olympiacos defense for most of the match.
Bayern finally won this match successfully with a score of 2-0 after Ivan Perisic scored the second goal in the final minutes. Bayern also ensure a breakthrough into the last 16.
